sentences.sContent: We could give control completely over to robotic cars, ala Minority Report.
sentences.sContent_eng: We could give control completely over to robotic cars, ala Minority Report.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以给机器人的控制完全交给车，翼少数派报告。
